name: Unrect
description: Build a home for your colony to live in peace, and protect it from aggressive creatures. Command your colonists, strategize your defense and survive the enemy attacks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10, 32 bit Processor: 2.0GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card made in 2010 or later DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
